message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. I know it's worth a lot to you, and this is a fair price considering its value.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low yet.  How about $9,250? That's a good compromise that still reflects the value of the product. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I am willing to increase my offer to $9,100. This is my final offer as I am also considering other options.
